chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem as follows:

Hello,
I ordered an item in "perfect condition".
It arrived quickly, well packed, without the original box.

After unpacking I inspect it... it's not what I consider to be "perfect condition", there are two huge scratches on the edge => see attached photo.
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

The package has been delivered since June 3, the deadline has passed. Please reimburse the customer within 24 working hours, otherwise we will do it for you.

If you still have not received the package, please complete the attached document so that I can launch the investigation with the carrier.

Thank you for understanding,
Marijo Georgelluca from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
